select * from scholarship
and qualification_detail like '%${filterInput.school}%'
and major_sort like '%${filterInput.department}%'
and (major_sort like '%${filterInput.major}%' or qualification_detail like '%${filterInput.major}%')
and grade_stand_detail like '%${filterInput.grade}%'
and (qualification_detail like '%${filterInput.attendance}%' or qualification_restriction_detail like '%${filterInput.attendance}%')
and income_bracket like '%${filterInput.incomeBracket}%'
(qualification_detail like '%${filterInput.class}%' or income_stand_detail like '%${filterInput.class}%')
and (id like '%${address}%' or local_residence_detail like '%${filterInput.address}%')
scholarship_type like '%${type}%'
and duplicate_benefit = TRUE
select * from scholarship where id like '%${searchWord}%' order by duration_detail asc;
select count(1) from scholarship where id = #{scholarshipId}
